message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $85.  What do you think?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $85. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still looking to get a better price for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $105 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $95. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $102. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to pay $98.  If we can't come to an agreement at that price, I'll have to consider my other options.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $100. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
